Package.Name: SupportQuota
Package.License: GNU AFFERO GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3, November 2007
Package.ChangeLog: Use Perl bind paramenters on SQL queries. Implement translations. Brazilian Portuguese and German translations.
Rename module file. Remove some unnecessary files.
Database connection optimizations and runtime exception handling.
Fix display when no time accounting and add ability to configure recurrence.
Add French and update Deutsch translations.
Update to Framework v4.0. For Framework v3.3 support, get SupportQuota v0.0.6.
Fix an issue for customers with no quota.
Sanitize undefined quotas to avoid log errors.
Package.Description: Add support to work unit quotas by customer company and displays the quotas in the agent interface.
Ajoute la possibilité de gérer des crédits temps de support par client et d'afficher ces informations dans l'interface des agents.
Adiciona suporte a cotas de unidades de trabalho por empresa cliente e mostra as cotas na interface do agente.
